title: Futsuu no Joshikousei ga [Locodol] Yattemita.: Nagarekawa, Annai Shitemita.
original_name: 普通の女子校生が【ろこどる】やってみた。流川、案内してみた。
opening_song: "Mirai Fanfare (ミライファンファーレ)" by Nagarekawa Girls [Nanako Usami (Miku Itou), Yukari Kohinata (Sachika Misawa)]
ending_song: "Mirai Shoujo-tachi (未来少女たち)" by Nanako Usami (Miku Itou), Yukari Kohinata (Sachika Misawa), Yui Mikoze (Maya Yoshioka), Mirai Nazukari (Inori Minase)
sinopse: Unaired episode titled "Nagarekawa, Annai Shite Mita." bundled with the Volume 1 Blu-ray/DVD.
